entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: WSW 35 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local snow squalls near Lake Erie. Amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Amount 4 cm in snow squalls. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
